item.title: Why I'm voting Lucinda for Union President
item.author: Hayley Thompson,
item.description: While there’s no denying that I’d love a 70p pint at the union on a Wednesday as much as the next person, I will be voting for Lucinda as our next union president and I’m here to tell you why. Having spent the past three years studying Biology at Imperial, playing and this year captaining the Ladies …
